body.name: HP Laptop, Newest 14" Ultral Light Laptop for Students and Business, Intel Celeron N4120, 4GB RAM, 64GB eMMC, WiFi, Bluetooth, HDMI, Webcam, USB Type-A&C, Win 11 S, GM Accessory-White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 25 mins
features: 【Processor & Graphics】Intel Celeron N4120, 4 Cores & 4 Threads, 1.10 GHz Base Frequency, up to 2.60 GHz Burst Frequency. Intel UHD Graphics 600, handle multitasking reliably, lifelike color and details for internet use, photo/video editing, streaming, and gaming, built to be what you need it to be.

【RAM & Storage】4 GB DDR4-2400 MHz RAM, Adequate high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run multiple applications and browser tabs all at once, 64 GB Storage, an embedded multimedia card provides reliable flash-based storage, enhance the overall performance of the laptop for business, student, daily usage.

【14" HD Display】14.0-inch diagonal, HD (1366 x 768), micro-edge, BrightView. Revolutionize your display and see more of what you love with this slim bezel design. Enjoy an immersive multimedia experience with a maximized viewing area, making it perfect for streaming movies, browsing the web, or working on graphic-intensive projects.
【Multiple Ports For Maximum Connectivity】1 x USB 3.1 Type-C ports, 2 x USB 3.1 Type-A ports, 1 x HDMI, 1 x Headphone/Microphone Combo Jack, and there's a microSD slot.

【Powerful Configuration】802.11a/b/g/n/ac (2x2)(19a) Wi-Fi and Bluetooth combo, stay connected to Wi-Fi and to Bluetooth accessories with wireless technology. HP True Vision 720p HD camera with integrated dual array digital microphones, video chat with vibrant clarity, even in low light.
body.description: Windows 11 Home in S mode You may switch to regular windows 11: Press "Start button" bottom left of the screen; Select "Settings" icon above "power" icon;Select "Activation", then Go to Store; Select Get option under "Switch out of S mode"; Hit Install. (If you also see an "Upgrade your edition of Windows" section, be careful not to click the "Go to the Store" link that appears there.) Key Specs Screen Size: 14 inches Screen Resolution: 1366 x 768 (HD) Processor Model: Intel Celeron Processor Model Number: N4120 Storage Type: eMMC Total Storage Capacity: 64 gigabytes eMMC Capacity: 64 gigabytes System Memory (RAM): 4 gigabytes Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 600 Operating System: Windows 11 Home in S Mode Display Connector(s): 1 x HDMI Battery Life (up to):11.5 hours Display Type:LCD Screen Size:14 inches Screen Resolution:1366 x 768 (HD) Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 600 Dimensions: 12.76 x 8.86 x 0.71 inches Weight: 3.24 lbs Overall, the HP laptop is the perfect blend of power, portability, and versatility. Whether you're a student, professional, or casual user, it's the perfect companion for all your computing needs.

reviews.reviewText: Perfect for my daughter starting her first year of college I will order again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great for what I wanted it for, a little slow when first booted up but that's fine👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After my 2 year old got ahold of my 2020 MacBook Air and caused complete water damage to it, I was forced to get this HP laptop as a replacement since I’m a student and couldn’t afford to go out and buy a new apple product. I had high hopes for this computer considering it’s good reviews.Immediately upon setting up, I received a message on the display saying that the battery storage capacity was low and that the battery would likely have to be replaced soon since it was old. Not what you expect when you’re buying a new computer but okay. I figured I would just exchange it for a new one once I got my school assignments for the week completed.Yeah, no. This computer was slow in all aspects, took incredibly long to start up, opening the internet browser took FOREVER, and it just felt so cheap overall. Never again. I found a used MacBook on offerup for about the same price as this one and decided to just purchase that and return this crappy computer.Take it from me, get something else. Im pretty tech savvy, being a 23 year old college student and I still couldn’t make this computer work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great inexpensive option for a college student
reviews.reviewText: My son has a high power computer for gaming and general use, however it wasn't mobile and he needed that for college. It comes well equipped and easy to set up. It is still a nice system even though it is not crazy expensive. For everyday Office programming and internet browsing, it will last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is great for travel. Works well for what I use it for. Definitely recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This is Windows 11 S Mode
reviews.reviewText: Under Operating System in specs it says Windows 11. However it is actually Windows 11 S-mode which makes it impossible to download any app that is not in the Microsoft store. After an hour of trying to download an app I use everyday I finally found a way to turn off S-mode. Real pain.If you don't want to deal with Big Brother Microsoft get a computer that doesn't have S mode.In the web title it does read Windows 11 S but nowhere else & not in the specs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Aggravated please read this.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift and they just got to using it or rather trying to and it will not turn on. I took it apart replaced the battery and it’s a deeper issue. Do not buy this it is garbage, it’s my fault for going cheap for a student but I STRONGLY recommend that you do not purchase this headache. GARBAGE buyer beware.
